channel.title: CVE Feed for spicethemes -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-5362|2024-08-02T07:59:43.765Z -- spicethemes -- carousel%2C%20recent%20post%20slider%20and%20banner%20slider
item.description: The Carousel, Recent Post Slider and Banner Slider plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'spice_post_slider' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 2.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
